description: Congratulations on joining [server_name]! As a proud citizen of our town, you now have the opportunity to contribute to our community's prosperity. Wear this badge with pride and help our economy thrive!
name: Joining Badge

description: A quantifiable piece of experience that unlocks your way through the world of economics.
name: Merkado Experience

description: Delight in this traditional Filipino steamed rice cake, a sweet blend of rice flour, tapioca flour, and brown sugar. Often enjoyed with freshly grated coconut, this beloved snack grants you N energy points, fueling your journey with its irresistible charm!
name: Kutsinta

description: A sweet snack made from silken tofu, highlighting street food economies.
name: Taho

description: A fine Filipino snack that is loved by many! It is a delicious dish made with saba in a lumpia wrapper, coated in brown sugar and is deep-fried. One is never enough! This snack gives you N energy points.
name: Turon

description: A boiled duck embryo, representing both a common snack and delicacy.
name: Balut

description: Spring rolls, often made in large quantities for social gatherings and trading.
name: Lumpia

description: A dessert, illustrating the mix of cultures and economic classes.
name: Halo-Halo

description: A rice cake, symbolizing traditional economies and festive markets.
name: Bibingka

description: Noodles, often used to symbolize long life and prosperity.
name: Pancit

description: A sour soup, representing a staple food in households.
name: Sinigang

description: A marinated meat dish, known for being economical and widespread.
name: Adobo

description: A peanut sauce-based stew, often considered a special occasion dish.
name: Kare-Kare

description: A roasted pig dish, often a luxury good at major celebrations.
name: Lechon

description: A staple food resource, fundamental for population growth and stability.
name: Grain

description: Powers factories and is traded for other vital resources.
name: Coal

description: Essential for building structures or trading for other resources.
name: Timber

description: A crucial energy resource, powering cities or vehicles.
name: Oil Barrels

description: A rugged, well-used container brimming with the essentials for any tinkerer. Within its sturdy frame lies an assortment of tools, each with the potential to mend, create, and innovate. Unlock its potential to transform your simple ideas into grand inventions!
name: Toolbox

description: Gleaming remnants of a bygone age, these jagged metal scraps hold the whispers of past machinery. Collect enough of these scraps to upgrade your technology, crafting powerful tools that could turn the tide of your adventure!
name: Metal Scraps

description: Used in manufacturing weapons, tools, or industrial products.
name: Iron Ingots

description: A luxury good, used in trading for higher value items or services.
name: Silk

description: A valuable mineral used as currency or to craft high-end items.
name: Gold Ore

description: High-value trade items used in luxury goods or as a currency reserve.
name: Gems

description: Merkats are the official currency of Merkado, serving as a medium of exchange, unit of account, and store of value within the economy.
name: Merkats
